ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How do I cancel my staking on mobile app?

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
1. Log in to your Ndax account 2 Tap on the Staking on the bottom right area of the screen 3. Select your staked crypto you want to unstake 4. Tap on the 3 dots to the top right of the staking plan 5. Tap 'Redeem funds' 6. Enter the amount to redeem, then tap 'Confirm' 7. Select 'Standard' or 'Instant' redemption (depending on your plan, instant redemption might not be available) by tapping 'Confirm'
Please note that there is an un-bonding period between 1-28 days, depending on the staking plan you have. Once the un-bonding period is complete, your crypto will return to your Ndax wallet.
